Or if you're up for something a bit more surreal, "Donnie Darko" is a thought-provoking ride that'll keep you guessing until the very end!

With Colin Farrell and Shea Whigham leading the cast, it's an edge-of-your-seat ride that will keep you engaged from start to finish.

With an all-star cast featuring Michael Douglas, Tobey Maguire, and Robert Downey Jr., it's a thought-provoking and entertaining ride.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more supernatural, "Army of Darkness" might be right up your alley. Bruce Campbell stars as Ash Williams, a chainsaw-wielding hero who must battle his way through an army of the dead to return home. It's a hilarious and action-packed romp that's sure to delight fans of cult classics!
